name: International Space Redneck Boxingolf Champyurnship Edishun
name_original: International Space Redneck Boxingolf Champyurnship Edishun
description:
Howdy! Here you'll find the game that we made for the EGX Student Game Jam 2019, clocking in at just over 24 hours work for the whole team!

Designed for two players and in need of some improvements, but definitely worth a try.
